title: Soukou Kihei Votoms: AT Stories
original_name: 装甲騎兵ボトムズ AT Stories
sinopse:
A collection of short side stories of the Soukou Kihei Votoms series.

1. The Last Bitch Standing at Tyglem, 7213
2. Koko ja Nai Doko ka
3. "Death from Above" at Sol Highlland, 7209
4. Warera no Iru Basho
5. "Starved Pack" at Jingle, 7212
6. Kaerubeki Tokoro
7. "Giant Footsteps" at Alemor, 7208
8. "The Killing Field" at Woode, 7214
9. Tamashii no Yukusaki
10. "A Fisherman's Tale" at Cove, 7222
